lu.uni.geko.util.bridges
Class EclipseBridge

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.util.bridges.EclipseBridge

public final class EclipseBridge
extends Object

A utility class hiding details of the Eclipse API for recurring tasks that are not project-specific.

(Note that it is disputable whether this class conforms to the bridge pattern as we are currently only providing one implementation and the "abstractions" can be regarded as low-level.)

Constructor Summary

          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

Method Detail

installAndStartNewPluginFromInstalledPlugin

public static org.osgi.framework.Bundle installAndStartNewPluginFromInstalledPlugin(String installedPluginID,
                                                                                    String newPluginID,
                                                                                    String newPluginLocation)
                                                                             throws org.osgi.framework.BundleException
Installs and starts the plug-in with the given ID at the given location using the context of an already installed plug-in.

Parameters:
installedPluginID - the ID of the plug-in that provides the context for installing the new plug-in
newPluginID - the id of the new plug-in
newPluginLocation - the location identifier of the new plug-in
Returns:
the new plug-in
Throws:
org.osgi.framework.BundleException - if the installation failed or if the plug-in could not be started

getUniqueRegisteredExtension

public static <T> T getUniqueRegisteredExtension(String extensionPointID,
                                                 String propertyName,
                                                 Class<T> extensionClass)
Returns the registered extension for the given property of the given extension point ID if the registered extension is unique (i.e. no other extension extends this extension point) and the property is an instance of the given class. Throws a RuntimeException if no extension or more than one extensions are registered or if the registered extension is not an instance of the given class.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the extension point property
Parameters:
extensionPointID - the ID of the extension point to be inspected
propertyName - the name of the extension point property
extensionClass - the class of the extension point property
Returns:
the registered extension

getRegisteredExtensions

public static <T> List<T> getRegisteredExtensions(String extensionPointID,
                                                  String propertyName,
                                                  Class<T> extensionClass)
Returns a list that contains all registered extensions for the given property of the given extension point ID if the property is an instance of the given class for all registered extensions.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the extension point property
Parameters:
extensionPointID - the ID of the extension point to be inspected
propertyName - the name of the extension point property
extensionClass - the class of the extension point property
Returns:
a list containing the registered extensions

getRegisteredExtensionsInDescPriority

public static <T> List<T> getRegisteredExtensionsInDescPriority(String extensionPointID,
                                                                String propertyName,
                                                                String priorityPropertyName,
                                                                Class<T> extensionClass)
Returns a list that contains all registered extensions for the given property of the given extension point ID if the property is an instance of the given class for all registered extensions and if the given priority property exists. The list is ordered by decreasing priority (i.e. starting with the extension having the highest integer value priority).

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the extension point property
Parameters:
extensionPointID - the ID of the extension point to be inspected
propertyName - the name of the extension point property
priorityPropertyName - the name of the priority property used for ordering
extensionClass - the class of the extension point property
Returns:
a list containing the registered extensions ordered by decreasing priority

getRegisteredExtensionsWithPriority

public static <T> List<Pair<T,Integer>> getRegisteredExtensionsWithPriority(String extensionPointID,
                                                                            String propertyName,
                                                                            String priorityPropertyName,
                                                                            Class<T> extensionClass)
Returns a list that contains all registered extensions for the given property of the given extension point ID together with their priority property if the property is an instance of the given class for all registered extensions and if the given priority property exists. The list is not sorted in any particular order.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the extension point property
Parameters:
extensionPointID - the ID of the extension point to be inspected
propertyName - the name of the extension point property
priorityPropertyName - the name of the priority property used for ordering
extensionClass - the class of the extension point property
Returns:
a list containing the registered extensions together with their priority

sortExtensionsDescByPriority

public static <T> void sortExtensionsDescByPriority(List<Pair<T,Integer>> extensionsWithPriority)
Sorts the given extension-priority pairs descending according to their priority.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the extensions
Parameters:
extensionsWithPriority - a list of extension-priority pairs

callInProtectedMode

public static <T> T callInProtectedMode(Callable<T> callable)
Calls the given callable in a protected mode and returns the result (waiting for the result to be computed). Exceptions thrown in the callable are printed to the default error console and softened (i.e. rethrown as RuntimeException).

Type Parameters:
T - the return type of the callable
Parameters:
callable - the callable to be run in protected mode
Returns:
the result of the callable
See Also:
SafeRunner.run

runInProtectedMode

public static void runInProtectedMode(Runnable runnable)
Runs the given runnable in a protected mode and waits for the corresponding thread to finish this computation. Exceptions thrown in the runnable are printed to the default error console and softened (i.e. rethrown as RuntimeException).

Parameters:
runnable - the runnable to be run in protected mode
See Also:
SafeRunner.run

getCurrentStructuredSelection

public static org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredSelection getCurrentStructuredSelection(org.eclipse.core.commands.ExecutionEvent event)
Returns the value of the structured selection variable of the given execution event.

Parameters:
event - an execution event of the user interface
Returns:
the structured selection of the event

turnOffAutoBuildIfOn

public static boolean turnOffAutoBuildIfOn()
                                    throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Turns off the automatic build feature of the workbench if it is currently switched on and returns true when this was the case.

Returns:
whether autobuild was on
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if the feature could not be set

turnOnAutoBuild

public static void turnOnAutoBuild()
                            throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Turns on the automatic build feature of the workbench.

Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if the feature could not be set
